TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PathDirection extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指示为网站导航控件呈现导航节点的层次结构顺序。

span.span: Indicates the hierarchical order in which navigation nodes are rendered for site-navigation controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举由控件以指定用于呈现站点地图节点的顺序。The enumeration is used by the control to specify the ordering used to render site map nodes. 如果属性设置为 RootToCurrent，最常见的方式，从当前节点中，从左到右的最顶层节点中显示的导航路径。If the property is set to RootToCurrent, the navigation path is displayed in the most common way, from the top-most node to the current node, from left to right. 如果设置到 CurrentToRoot 的导航路径将显示从当前节点到最顶层节点，从左到右。If the is set to CurrentToRoot, the navigation path is displayed from the current node to the top-most node, from left to right. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置属性Web 窗体页中。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a in a Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_4/CS/catalog3cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_4/VB/catalog3vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection CurrentToRoot = int32(1)

summary.span: 以从当前节点到最顶层节点的层次结构顺序，从左到右地呈现节点。

span.span: Nodes are rendered in a hierarchical order from the current node to the top-most node, from left to right.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PathDirection RootToCurrent = int32(0)

summary.span: 以从最顶层节点到当前节点的层次结构顺序，从左到右地呈现节点。

span.span: Nodes are rendered in a hierarchical order from the top-most node to the current node, from left to right.
